title: Jungle Love | The Bride and the Beast 1958 (Adventure, Fantasy) Colorized | Full Movie

sources.title: Jungle Love | The Bride and the Beast 1958 (Adventure, Fantasy) Colorized | Full Movie
sources.description:
After Laura and Dan get married in Africa, Laura becomes infatuated with Dan's pet gorilla. Through hypnosis, it is revealed that Laura was the Queen of the Gorillas in a past life.

Original title: The Bride and the Beast (1958) 

Black & White version: https://youtu.be/HhRAym8erbI


Director: Adrian Weiss
Writers: Edward D. Wood Jr., Adrian Weiss
Stars: Charlotte Austin, Lance Fuller, Johnny Roth
Genres: Colorized classics, Adventure, Fantasy, Mystery

Many subtitle languages available for this movie
This movie has additional audio commentary by Tom Weaver, joined by Charlotte Austin & Bob Burns.  To activate the audio commentary go to settings ⚙️ and select "Interlingue" from the audio options menu.

00:00 Full Movie

1:01:26 A thrilling and suspenseful dialogue between two characters, involving deception, attempted murder, and the search for a missing wife.
